fields.name: Ledger Nano S
fields.description: Secure your assets and explore Web3 with the new Ledger Nano S Plus. Take the iconic Ledger Nano S, then make it Defi and NFT-friendly.

fields.name: Nano Ledger X
fields.description: Secure, buy, exchange, grow your crypto and manage your NFTs with our new Bluetooth-enabled hardware wallet. All your digital assets secured in one place.

fields.name: OTG Kit
fields.description: A set of 3 different cables to help you connect your hardware wallet to your Android phone or laptop: micro-USB to USB-C, micro-USB to USB-A, and USB-C.

fields.name: Trezor Model T
fields.description: The Trezor Model T is an advanced cryptocurrency hardware wallet. Store Bitcoin, passwords, tokens and other keys with confidence.

fields.name: Trezor One Model
fields.description:
Whether you're new to Bitcoin or already a security expert,
Trezor Model One is the #1 Bitcoin wallet choice for everybody.

fields.name: Cryptosteel Capsule Solo
fields.description:
A solid steel capsule to protect your 24-word Recovery Phrase. Designed to resist extreme conditions.
Your Recovery Phrase is the only backup of your crypto assets. You can now keep it safe with the Cryptosteel Capsule.
Add an extra layer of security by protecting your backup and experience ultimate resilience.

fields.name: The Billfodl
fields.description: Billfodl is a solid steel case to store and protect your 24-word recovery phrase, designed to resist fire, water - and more. Using character tiles, you recreate your recovery phrase in the steel unit, creating an almost indestructible backup.

fields.name: Extended USB-C Cable For Trezor Model T
fields.description: Do you need to connect your Trezor to a computer placed under your desk? Then you need this extra long Type-A to Type-C cable for a convenient connection.

fields.name: Cryptotag Zeus
fields.description: Your 24-word recovery phrase is the only backup to the crypto stored on your Ledger wallet. So it deserves the best protection possible. With CRYPTOTAG, it’s stored on 6mm-thick titanium that’s waterproof, fireproof, corrosion-proof, hackerproof, and bulletproof. Combined with your Ledger device, your crypto has never been safer.

fields.name: Family Pack X
fields.description:
Get your family into crypto: help them secure, manage and grow their assets with a Ledger Nano X.
This pack contains 3 Ledger Nano X' to introduce your family to the world of cryptocurrencies.

This offer is limited to 5 packs per customer.

fields.name: X-Factor
fields.description: Edge-to-edge front print makes a big, bold, undeniable statement, Regular fit, and soft feel

fields.name: XRP Classic T-shirt
fields.description: XRP Network Graphic T-Shirt,  transfer technique prints crisp, vivid colors. Print placement may vary slightly from preview.

fields.name: Wallet T-Shirt
fields.description: The standard, traditional t-shirt for everyday wear, Heavyweight 5.3 oz / 180 gsm fabric, solid colors are 100% preshrunk cotton, heather grey is 90% cotton/10% polyester, denim heather is 50% cotton/ 50% polyester

fields.name: Digital Wallet T-Shirt
fields.description: Double-needle hems and neck band for durability standard, traditional t-shirt for everyday wear
